content: **crocheted bag in drops cotton light the piece is worked in the round with chain-spaces and double_crochet groups ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no cluster-098 yarn group b ------------------------------------------------------- **size** measurements crochet square approx 74 x 74 cm = 29 1/8 x 29 1/8 before edge and straps are worked straps approx 33 cm = 13 without edge approx 43 cm = 17 including edge note straps will stretch after use **materials** drops cotton light from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 250 g color 34 light jeans blue **crochet gauge** 18 double crochets in width and 9 row in height = 10 x 10 cm = 4 x 4 crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 mm = us 6 hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm = 4 change to a smaller hook size
